cosmos.question: I shine bright at night. I'm round and white. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm a slice!
🧀 Some people say I am made of this food

cosmos.question: I am big and hot, and give light to all. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I come out during the day.

cosmos.question: Twinkle twinkle, little _____. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I am high up in the sky.

cosmos.question: What is big and round, and you live here?

hints.text: 🌍 It is called the Third Rock from the Sun

cosmos.question: What goes around the Earth in a path?

hints.text: 🌑 It is smaller than the Earth.
🌚 You can see it at night.

cosmos.question: It's a big, hot ball of gas, far, far away!

hints.text: 🌌 The Sun is one example of this

cosmos.question: I am red and far away. People want to visit me one day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am named after a Roman god of war
🚀 People send rovers to explore me
👽 Some think aliens may live on me

cosmos.question: I am very big and made of gas, with pretty rings around me.

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am the second largest planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a place with many stars and planets.

hints.text: 💫 I am called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture in the sky.

hints.text: ✨ You can see me with a telescope

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make puddles! What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I come!

weather.question: I am big and yellow and make you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of a lemon!

weather.question: I am white and float in the sky. What am I?
I make the trees dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong!

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make a snowman with me!
🧤 You need gloves when I'm here!
🌨️ I melt when it gets warm!

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am like a bridge in the sky!
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo and violet!
☀️ You see me when the sun shines after rain!

weather.question: I am very loud and bright, and I come with the rain. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a flash of light!
⛈️ I am dangerous, stay inside when you see me!

weather.question: Sometimes I'm a big, wet storm with a lot of wind. What am I?
I'm small and frozen, falling from a stormy sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you!
⚽ I can be tiny or bigger.

weather.question: I'm white and frosty, covering the ground on a cold morning. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 You see me when it's very cold and damp.
